review_title: Awesome place to work! Like family!
job_title: Director of Radiology in Florence, AL
pros: Best CEO I've ever worked for! All Administrative staff are very approachable and easy to speak with. Not a lot of egos, everyone just wants to give excellent patient care!
cons: Pay could be better, but the environment makes up for it. There is no matching for 401k. That would be nice as well.

pros: Family like environment, employees work as a team.
cons: It’s extremely hard to get a raise.

review_title: Great environment and co-workers, great place for part time job
pros: Very flexible schedule working in the Business Office at ECM East. Great and friendly co-workers and management staff that will listen to problems and reward effective problem solving as well.
cons:
Transition to a for-profit hospital has cut back on yearly salary raises for many people. 
Sometimes work gets passed around between people who don't want to do it or who don't know how to correctly do it so becomes more work for others in the long run. Lack of discipline/training for repeat offenders of previous statement.

pros: Great patients to care for and some great nurses who still care about the importance of their jobs
cons: Poor mgt structure, poor internal communication between employees and mgt, unfair practices in employee monitoring of job performance..very low pay scale for industry standard

pros: The only good thing about working for this company was my fellow co-workers.
cons: Over-worked, under-paid, and the management was very sloppy. The environment was unesscesarily stressful due to poor management and disorganization.

review_title: A typical hospital. Nothing really bad but nothing special.
pros: Fellow workers are great to work with. Some managers are great to work for.
cons: Low wages & high turnover. Short staffed & as such mandatory OT.

pros:
-A good place of employment for new grads
-Friendly employees on my floor (3W)
-Adequate training program
cons: -If even one nurse calls in sick, there are not many nurses to replace to make safe nurse-to-patient ratios

job_title: Certified Nurses' Assistant in Florence, AL
pros: They offered job training for job advancement.
cons: Not being able to rely on managers to not disclose who has submitted a complaint, hence causing a hostile environment.

pros: Great coworkers. Great place to get forst year's experience.
cons: Mandatory overtime. Poor staffing. Not enough supplies to adequately perform my job.

pros:
People are awesome 
Bosses were also awesome
cons: Pay wasn't the absolute best, but the work environment made up for it.

pros: The other employees were great to work with.
cons:
Benefits are horrible.
Management is horrible.
